element.name: Tregolani Homebrew Collection
element.description:
This is a collection of personal homebrew created by Tregolani for DnD campaigns. Currently included in the collection are:

  • Items: Captain's Wright, Cursed Amulet of the Chameleon, Earrings of Alluring Charisma, Handwraps of the Flowing Soul, Necklace of Inspired Wisdom, Quiver of Radiance, Sandals of Incredible Dexterity, Sentinel Shield +1, Surgeon's Tools
  • Feats: Elemental Blood, Healer (Improved), Titan Grip
  • Spells:
    • Cantrips: jolt, shockbolt, lance of faith
    • 4th-level: crushing breaker
    • 5th-level: forked lightning
    • 6th-level: storm conduit
    • 9th-level: tempest barrage
  • Classes: Barbarian (Avarice), Sorcerer (Revised), Sorcerer (Wisdom)
  • Subclasses: College of Glamour (One-Dnd), Sea Sorcery (Revised), Tinkerer Physician (Artificer)
  • Races: Hexblood
